verses.verse: <S%H3863>Oh<s%> that thou wouldest <S%H7167>rend<s%> the <S%H8064>heavens<s%>, that thou wouldest come <S%H3381>down<s%>, that the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> might flow <S%H2151>down<s%> at thy <S%H6440>presence<s%>,

As when the <S%H2003>melting<s%> <S%H784>fire<s%> <S%H6919>burneth<s%>, the <S%H784>fire<s%> causeth the <S%H4325>waters<s%> to <S%H1158>boil<s%>, to make thy <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H3045>known<s%> to thine <S%H6862>adversaries<s%>, that the <S%H1471>nations<s%> may <S%H7264>tremble<s%> at thy <S%H6440>presence<s%>! the melting: Heb. the fire of meltings

When thou <S%H6213>didst<s%> terrible <S%H3372>things<s%> which we <S%H6960>looked<s%> not for, thou camest <S%H3381>down<s%>, the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> flowed <S%H2151>down<s%> at thy <S%H6440>presence<s%>.

For since the beginning of the <S%H5769>world<s%> men have not <S%H8085>heard<s%>, nor perceived by the <S%H238>ear<s%>, neither hath the <S%H5869>eye<s%> <S%H7200>seen<s%>, O <S%H430>God<s%>, <S%H2108>beside<s%> thee, what he hath <S%H6213>prepared<s%> for him that <S%H2442>waiteth<s%> for him. seen: or, seen a God beside thee, which doeth so for him, etc

Thou <S%H6293>meetest<s%> him that <S%H7797>rejoiceth<s%> and <S%H6213>worketh<s%> <S%H6664>righteousness<s%>, those that <S%H2142>remember<s%> thee in thy <S%H1870>ways<s%>: behold, thou art <S%H7107>wroth<s%>; for we have <S%H2398>sinned<s%>: in those is <S%H5769>continuance<s%>, and we shall be <S%H3467>saved<s%>.

But we are all as an <S%H2931>unclean<s%> thing, and all our <S%H6666>righteousnesses<s%> are as <S%H5708>filthy<s%> <S%H899>rags<s%>; and we all do <S%H5034>fade<s%> <S%H1101><s%> as a <S%H5929>leaf<s%>; and our <S%H5771>iniquities<s%>, like the <S%H7307>wind<s%>, have taken us <S%H5375>away<s%>.

And there is none that <S%H7121>calleth<s%> upon thy <S%H8034>name<s%>, that stirreth <S%H5782>up<s%> himself to take <S%H2388>hold<s%> of thee: for thou hast <S%H5641>hid<s%> thy <S%H6440>face<s%> from us, and hast <S%H4127>consumed<s%> us, <S%H3027>because<s%> of our <S%H5771>iniquities<s%>. consumed: Heb. melted because: Heb. by the hand
But now, O <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, thou art our <S%H1>father<s%>; we are the <S%H2563>clay<s%>, and thou our <S%H3335>potter<s%>; and we all are the <S%H4639>work<s%> of thy <S%H3027>hand<s%>.

Be not <S%H7107>wroth<s%> very <S%H3966>sore<s%>, O <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, neither <S%H2142>remember<s%> <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> for <S%H5703>ever<s%>: behold, <S%H5027>see<s%>, we beseech thee, we are all thy <S%H5971>people<s%>.
Thy <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> are a <S%H4057>wilderness<s%>, <S%H6726>Zion<s%> is a <S%H4057>wilderness<s%>, <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> a <S%H8077>desolation<s%>.

Our <S%H6944>holy<s%> and our <S%H8597>beautiful<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%>, where our <S%H1>fathers<s%> <S%H1984>praised<s%> thee, is burned <S%H8316>up<s%> with <S%H784>fire<s%>: and all our pleasant <S%H4261>things<s%> are laid <S%H2723>waste<s%>.
Wilt thou <S%H662>refrain<s%> thyself for these things, O <S%H3068>LORD<s%>? wilt thou hold thy <S%H2814>peace<s%>, and <S%H6031>afflict<s%> us very <S%H3966>sore<s%>?
